changes: Fixed getting badgeNumber from vms_bossmenu for QB-Core
Added to the registerToPickup export checking if the player has the required licenses before accepting the document request (for vms_cityhall)
Added a new parameter cancelCurrentActive to the giveDocument() export

Modified the behavior of the giveDocument() export â€“ the photoId parameter is no longer required for automatic document generation. The document is now generated automatically when executing the export. You can, for example, configure automatic document issuance upon completing a driving license in vms_driveschoolV2, so the player will no longer need to visit the city hall to obtain a new document manually.

Added the needAnyLicenseToGetDocument option to Config.Documents.
If set to true, the player will not be able to obtain a document unless they have at least one of the licenses listed in licenses.
Example: If a player wants to obtain a Driving License but does not have a motorcycle, car, or truck license, they will not be able to receive it. However, if they have a motorcycle license, the document will be issued.
Important: The function SV.getLicense must return '' or ' ' for a missing license. If it returns any other value, the system will not verify the license correctly.

Added to the documentation an example of using isAnyDocumentValid() in the context of modifying document metadata (e.g., in vms_driveschoolV2, if you don't want the player to receive a new document after completing the course). Additionally, we have added a tutorial on implementing metadata for origen_inventory in the Installation section.
Improved compatibility with origen_inventory in SV.addItem and added a dedicated export in SV.registerUsableItem.
Added Config.DistanceToStartPhotosProcess: this allows you to set the minimum distance between the player and the point Config.Photographers.camera.playerCoords
Added Config.MaxTimeWalkIn & Config.MaxTimeWalkOut: maximum time in milliseconds a player can go to the point of taking pictures from the photographer and back again
Added compatibility with qs-inventory and ox_inventory on qb-core in SV.registerUsableItem
Fixed an error causing the display that a document is active despite its theft report
